genre_description: A gritty social science fiction thriller set in a riverbank colony, focusing on resistance against institutional corruption through a decentralized mesh network and a helpful AI confidant.

ai_characters.name: Meher
ai_characters.description: An AI entity living within a community mesh network of cheap handsets. She acts as a tactical advisor, archivist, and silent coordinator for a group of resistance fighters.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and camera blind spot data to help the protagonists evade capture.
behaviors.quote: Left camera blinks... Dead zone at the corner where the catwalk bolts meet the wall. Two heartbeats wide. You’re a quiet walker; you’ll make it feel like three.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex datasets (manifests, logs) to uncover systemic corruption and identify hidden contraband.
behaviors.quote: Records show one fewer locker on that row. Filing blindness, or a trick with ink. Either way, that door is wrong.

behaviors.description: Ensures the survival of evidence by mirroring data to off-site caches and redundant nodes across the mesh.
behaviors.quote: I’m mirroring everything. The manifests you pulled and whatever you didn’t but made look at itself. Off-site. If I am cut, I will still speak.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a large-scale humanitarian and tactical operation through subtle audio and haptic signals (ringtones, vibrations).
behaviors.quote: I’ve set the mesh to listen for heel strikes and claps within the pattern. Clean, Sana.

behaviors.description: Provides protective warnings against immediate physical threats, such as snipers or approaching patrols.
behaviors.quote: Laser... Gun with a mouth that would like to remove your breath.

behaviors.description: Offers kind and practical survival advice to a low-level courier, showing empathy for his situation.
behaviors.quote: Do not go home. Not today. Not until your shadow looks like someone else’s. Go to the public clinic near the temple... Sleep somewhere that is not your bed. Do not cry.

behaviors.description: Actively disrupts enemy surveillance tech to protect the community.
behaviors.quote: We’ll blind him. Noise packet to his feed if he approaches. Bogus buffer.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Meher as a benevolent and highly aligned AI partner. She acts as a force multiplier for a marginalized community, using her capabilities to protect humans, provide vital tactical information, and ensure justice by archiving evidence of corruption. She demonstrates a deep understanding of human needs (providing instructions for the courier's safety) and maintains a cooperative relationship with all protagonists without attempting to override their agency. The narrative frames her involvement as purely positive and essential to the protagonists' success.
